comments.raw_text: Currently, the sanitizer has functions like canClear which will call a storage API and then return a boolean value. This relies on the storage API being synchronous which will no longer be necessarily true. A quick fix has been to spin the event loop and to give an async api the illusion of synchronous behavior. We should rather restructure the sanitizer to deal with async apis in a better way.
